amendment.description: To require annual reports on United States contributions to the United Nations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4495 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6347) To require annual reports on United States contributions to the United Nations.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4495 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4495 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Inhofe.
